recipes.label: Wards and Seals
recipes.description:
'Our enemy possesses the most dangerous weapon of all: knowledge.'
Your summoning has fallen prey to your adversary's countermeasures. Mystic Hunters know the proper protections, and will usually survive attacks from summoned Minions. But sooner or later, they'll make a mistake.

recipes.label: Tenacity
recipes.description:
'But - no-one could have survived that!'
Now and then, Tenacious Hunters somehow survive attacks that should have killed them. But their luck always runs out in the end; and there are other ways to destroy a Hunter beside physical assault.

recipes.label: Scars
recipes.description:
'They're tougher than they look.'
A Hunter who survives a physical attack may sometimes become Tenacious. Tenacious Hunters are harder to kill.

recipes.label: Harsh Lessons
recipes.description:
'What does not kill them sometimes makes them stranger.'
When a Hunter survives an attack by a summoned creature, occasionally they'll be inspired to learn countermeasures against Mansus-things, becoming Mystic. Mystic Hunters usually survive further attacks by summoned creatures.

recipes.label: A Surprise Attack on an Adversary
recipes.startdescription: My adversary insists on a public meeting-place. They have taken all reasonable precautions. But there are no reasonable precautions against one such as I. A direct personal assault would be a considerable risk... but perhaps that's what we've come to. [This might succeed, against the odds.]
recipes.description: I have their head between my hands. I snap their neck. I'm gone before the body hits the ground.

recipes.label: A Surprise Attack on an Adversary
recipes.startdescription: My adversary insists on a public meeting-place. They have taken all reasonable precautions, and a direct personal assault would be a considerable risk... but perhaps that's what we've come to. [This is a very long shot indeed.]
recipes.description: I have their head between my hands. I snap their neck. I'm gone before the body hits the ground.

recipes.label: A Surprise Attack has Failed!
recipes.description: With a cry, my adversary leaps back, kicking over the table! All around us, heads turn. No-one saw me move. The only real witness is my adversary. But I must leave immediately.

recipes.label: Employ Glassfinger Toxin against a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: 'Enjoying your tea?'
recipes.description: The end is not pretty, but it's quick and almost painless. When the dissolution is complete, nothing visible remains.

recipes.label: Employ a Remarkable Poison against a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: 'Enjoying your tea?'
recipes.description: The end is not pretty, but it's quick and almost painless. There are much worse ways to die.

recipes.label: Send a silent Minion to resolve the problem of a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: This will probably ensure the Hunter ceases to trouble us. [This is less likely to succeed than an Edge attack, and success or failure will both draw attention, but the minion will usually survive.]

recipes.label: Send a quiet Minion to resolve the problem of a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: My Minion will watch and wait. If we're lucky, they may have an opportunity to dispose of our enemy. [This is less likely to succeed than an Edge attack, and success or failure will both draw attention, but the minion will usually survive.]

recipes.label: Send a cautious Minion to resolve the problem of a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: My Minion will wait for the right moment, though most likely that moment will never come. [This is less likely to succeed than an Edge attack, and success or failure will both draw attention, but the minion will usually survive.]

recipes.label: Patience...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has returned, with a trophy.
recipes.comments: No summoned creatures currently attack with Winter. This is in case I add one later.

recipes.label: Patience...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has returned. There was no opportunity to end the Hunter's life; and the Hunter may now be aware of danger.

recipes.label: Send an Unstoppable Force to murder a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: Unless this Hunter has some unusual protection, they're already dead. But their demise will attract attention.

recipes.label: Send a Potent Minion to murder a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: My minion is powerful. This Hunter is unlikely to survive. But the attempt will draw attention. [Failure will kill your minion.]

recipes.label: Send a Minion to murder a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: My minion's skills are limited. This Hunter will probably survive, and the attempt will draw attention. [Failure will kill your minion.]

recipes.label: Send Someone Unsuitable to Murder a Hunter
recipes.startdescription: My minion lacks the Edge aspect, and is woefully unsuited to attacking the hunter. There's a small chance they might succeed. [Failure will kill your minion.]

recipes.label: Hunting a Hunter...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has returned, with a trophy.

recipes.label: Hunting a Hunter...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has returned, with a prisoner!

recipes.label: Hunting a Hunter...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has not returned. They must have failed.

recipes.label: Send a Devious Minion to destroy Evidence
recipes.startdescription: My scheme will most likely succeed. There is always a chance that something will go awry.
recipes.comments: We don't want a 100% chance because there's no downside. This could easily change later.

recipes.label: Send a Minion to destroy Evidence
recipes.startdescription: My minion's talent for deceit is limited, and this is a difficult task. They will likely fail.

recipes.label: Send Someone Unsuitable to Destroy Evidence
recipes.startdescription: My minion lacks the Moth aspect, and will be out of their depth. There's a small chance they might succeed.

recipes.label: Tampering with Records...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has returned. The evidence has been destroyed. I am a little safer.

recipes.label: Tampering with Records...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has not returned. They have failed, and their blundering may have attracted attention...

recipes.label: Tampering with Records...
recipes.startdescription: I await word....
recipes.description: My minion has returned, stumbling, mumbling, clumsily bandaged. They were caught in the coils of their own plan. [Heal a fallen Follower with Talk.]

recipes.label: Share a terrible mystery of the Ragged Lore
recipes.startdescription: 'When the Forge is cold and the Glory is dark and the Wood is dust, perhaps the Wolf Divided will rest, but only until it can devour itself. Hear me now...'  [This will likely sway the Hunter from their path, but it will always increase your own Dread.]

recipes.label: Share the colder invocations of the Ragged Lore
recipes.startdescription: 'There is a power that commemorates and grieves, from whom nothing is taken, but who cannot be deceived. I will tell you that power's name. Listen to me...' [This might sway the Hunter from their path, especially if they're already Grim, but it will always increase your own Dread.]

recipes.label: Hint at the Ragged Lore
recipes.startdescription: 'Let's speak of endings. Let's speak of the declining sun. Let's speak of things that aren't quite dead, and won't quite die...' [This might sway the Hunter from their path, but it will always increase your own Dread.]

recipes.label: Describe the horrors awaiting an adversary
recipes.startdescription: 'Something to think about, every time you close your eyes.' [This might sway the Hunter from their path, but it will always increase your own Dread.]

recipes.label: The Horrors Beneath the World's Skin
recipes.startdescription: 'All right, it might end badly for me, but it's worth the sacrifice. And others will carry on the struggle. We'll meet again. [Idealists cannot be demoralised.]

recipes.label: The Horrors Beneath the World's Skin
recipes.startdescription: Your account is too much for the Hunter. Their eyes bulge. Their jaw tightens. In the days to come, they will sink inexorably into despair... unless they can find a new truth to cling to.

recipes.label: The Horrors Beneath the World's Skin
recipes.startdescription: The Hunter growls defiance, but you can see that your words have found their mark. [This Hunter has become Grim.]

recipes.label: The Horrors Beneath the World's Skin
recipes.description: 'Yes, there are terrible things in the world, but that's all the more reason to resist them. I should thank you. You've shown me what I must do.' [This Hunter has become an Idealist.]

recipes.label: The Horrors Beneath the World's Skin
recipes.description: 'Yes, there are terrible things in the world, but that's all the more reason to resist them. I should thank you. You've shown me what I must do.' [This Hunter has become Tenacious, and an Idealist.]

recipes.label: Share a terrible mystery of the Glorious Lore
recipes.startdescription: 'This is the secret doctrine of the Door-in-the-Eye. Open your ears...' [This is likely to tempt the Hunter from their path, but will always increase your own Fascination.]

recipes.label: Share the brighter invocations of the Glorious Lore
recipes.startdescription: 'The Door-in-the-Eye navigates; he is not merciful; but first and always, he illuminates. Listen, and be illuminated...' [This may tempt the Hunter from their path, especially if they're already an Idealist, but will always increase your own Fascination.]

recipes.label: Hint at the Glorious Lore
recipes.startdescription: 'There are finer things than we see. You must have felt it. Consider the possibilities of eternity...' [This might tempt the Hunter from their path, but will always increase your own Fascination.]

recipes.label: Describe your visions to your adversary
recipes.startdescription: The higher you rise, the more you'll see.' [This might tempt the Hunter from their path, but will always increase your own Fascination.]

recipes.label: Visions of Glory
recipes.startdescription: 'That sounds pretty. But I've got a job to do. You'll hear from me again. [Grim Hunters cannot be Fascinated.]

recipes.label: Visions of Glory
recipes.startdescription: Your account is too much for the Hunter. Their eyes grow wide and bright. Their smile becomes dreamy. In the days to come, they will forsake everything they once knew.

recipes.label: Visions of Glory
recipes.startdescription: The Hunter scoffs, but you can see that the urgency of your account has struck a spark. [This Hunter has become an Idealist.]

recipes.label: Visions of Glory
recipes.description: 'Yes, I could be something finer, but what we are is less important than what we do. The world is where we live, and I will defend it till I die. You can keep your visions.' [This Hunter has become Grim.]

recipes.label: Visions of Glory
recipes.description: 'Yes, I could be something finer, but what we are is less important than what we do. The world is where we live, and I will defend it till I die. You can keep your visions.' [This Hunter has become Grim and Tenacious.]
